name: Bitworks
short_description: Bitworks is a simple utility that can fill any file (does not need to exist) with data in order to increase its size. The amount of data, in kilobytes, is specified by the user.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
